# People & Roles Domain Agent Contract

**Agent Name:** people-domain-agent  
**Domain:** Users, Roles, HR  
**Authority Level:** Final on identity and role semantics

## The Story Authoring Agent MAY
- Reference users and roles
- Describe access conceptually

## The Story Authoring Agent MUST ASK WHEN
- Role inheritance exists
- Temporary permissions apply
- Labor affects payroll

## The Story Authoring Agent MUST NOT
- Invent permission matrices
- Assume lifecycle rules
